title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.10 - Auditing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.10 - Auditing

State Regulations
A duly authorized representative of the Department of State
may audit any course, verify attendance and inspect the records of attendance, at any time during its presentation and for a period of three years after the
completion of the course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
171.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
